articles.title: Singapore overtakes Hong Kong as Asia's top financial centre; 3rd in world - The Straits Times
articles.description:
New York is first and London second in the Global Financial Centres Index.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: HONG KONG - Singapore has overtaken Hong Kong to become Asia's top financial centre - and the third in the world after moving up three places - according to a new report that puts New York and London… [+1229 chars]
